name: The E3 Trail
description:
In the year 20XX mega corporations have stranglehold on the entertainment industry. The Giant Bomb guys have been in hiding, but now they are teaming up once again to go to E3 (Extinct Entertainment Expo) and put an end to the the mega corporations' influence.

FAQ:

Q: How do I buy items?

A: Click on the item you want, then click on the slot of the duder you wish to give it to.

Q: Why are there only two questions?

A: The world may never know

A game for Giant Rom 3

Music by Maximalism: http://maximalismmusic.com/album/soundtrack-for-a-...
